document.docAuthor: Çiftçi, Derya, Růžička, Jan, Hasbenli, Abdullah & Şahin, Ülfet
document.masterDocTitle: The large carrion beetles (Coleoptera: Silphidae) of Turkey: a review with a new species record

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The large carrion beetles (Coleoptera: Silphidae) of Turkey: a review with a new species record

Remarks. Widely distributed Transpalaearctic species, known from Europe to Japan (Růžička 2015). An error in the map provided by
Háva et al . (1998)
locating İspir in Van rather than Erzurum is corrected here for this species. Widely distributed through most of Turkey ( Fig. 18 ). Here reported for the first time from Antalya , Bitlis , Konya , Mardin and Siirt Provinces.
